TopicTitle: Tier two Mun landing and return.

Articles.Content:
Okay, maybe not that impressive, but it reminds me of the days when I was first playing the demo

Landing legs are over-rated, anyways.

So much science!o.o

It's been fun playing around with the part restrictions that they give us. I'm looking forwards to more updates to career mode.
It may be easier and more efficient to land on the engine bell rather than the decouplers, I think the engine has a higher impact tolerance. [citation needed]
Craft? I'd really like to try this out.
Yeah, landing on the bell is difficult, but certainly doable:
